snippet.title: How to help a child get over a dog bite
snippet.description:
* As a child, Ranjan Avasthi was once bitten by the family's German shepherd. His parents responded quickly by separating the two, bandaging his wounds and gradually reintroducing healthy interaction with the dog. Fast-forward a few decades. Avasthi, now a doctor, has a wife, child and his very own German shepherd mix.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/10/08/living/mnn-dog-bite/index.html

snippet.title: 441 species discovered in Amazon since 2010
snippet.description:
* A titi monkey that purrs like a cat is just one of hundreds of species discovered in the Amazon in recent years, according to the World Wildlife Fund.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/10/25/world/americas/amazon-species-discovered/index.html

snippet.title: How to adopt a great cat
snippet.description:
* While dogs offer wet kisses to just about anyone within licking distance, the feline persuasion prefers that you earn their purrs and cuddles. Since the American Pet Products Association (APPA) estimates that about 38 million U.S. households have cats, plenty of people are working overtime to pl...
http://www.cnn.com/2011/LIVING/02/01/mnn.adopt.great.cat/index.html

snippet.title: Furry pals can be partners in fitness
snippet.description:
* Under the California sun in a place known as Muscle Beach, where bronzed bodybuilders pump their cannon-size biceps, an energetic brunette works her arms -- and the weight purrs its approval.
http://www.cnn.com/2009/HEALTH/06/05/fat.cats.owners.exercise/index.html

snippet.title: Nestle-Ralston deal purrs
snippet.description:
* The U.S. Federal Trade Commission Tuesday approved Nestle SA's $10.1 billion acquisition of Ralston Purina Co., provided the companies divest some of their dry cat food brands.
http://europe.cnn.com/2001/BUSINESS/12/11/nestle/index.html

snippet.title: Cat Cafe unites friends of felines in New York
snippet.description:
* Along the Bowery in Manhattan, people waited in a line that would challenge any fancy art gallery opening or exclusive New York City club.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/24/us/new-york-cat-cafe/index.html
